stories.title: DataOps: Keeping the data flowing with Model-driven Operations

stories.text:
A dear friend of mine has been the CEO of a Cannabis company for the last while...

He is deeply experienced in the CPG (Consumer Packaged Goods) market, but transitioned to Cannabis due to familial connections to a very large Legal Grow Operations in California...

He knows a LOT about the industry..

Thousands and thousands of pounds, plus running one of the few type-7 extraction facilities in CA...

He is looking toward a "Cannabis CEO In Residence" type of position... although I am not sure any such position currently exists... but it should.

(like an EIR)

---

He is writing an essay that will reveal a lot about the industry - would there be interest here?
stories.title: Ask HN: Any interest in a “what I learned being a Cannabis CEO” essay?
